articles.description: Welcome to the Gold List 2023, our annual list of editors’ favourite hotels, resorts, and more. Here, are our picks for the best hotels and resorts in the world.
articles.content: Consider The Gold List the answer to the question our editors get asked more than any other: what are your favourite places to stay? Our annual collection, passionately selected by our international … [+25013 chars]

articles.title: Prince William and Kate Middleton share their no-fuss authentic Christmas card - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Prince and Princess of Wales have opted for a bright picture taken in Norfolk this summer with their children for their 2022 Christmas card, rather than a photograph from a formal festive shoot.
articles.content: While some royal families like to go all out with festive photoshoots involving reindeer, festive trees and snow, the Prince and Princess of Wales have released a sunshine-filled Christmas card for 2… [+8641 chars]

articles.title: Chris Kamara's life from his diagnosis and illness to wife, Yorkshire home and singing prowess - Leeds Live
articles.description: Chris Kamara will talk about being diagnosed with apraxia of speech in ITV show Chris Kamara: Lost for Words
articles.content: Many people will know former Leeds United star Chris Kamara for his punditry but there are aspects of his life that some fans may not even know. Chris Kamara was born in Middlesbrough, North Yorkshir… [+3508 chars]
